name: Epic Food Fight VR
description:
Get ready for the most delicious fight of your life!

Take part in an epic journey across 3 unique worlds and pelt children with delicious food! Dozens of unique enemies with special abilities! Incredibly fun and intense boss battles that will test your skills! Unlimited amounts of mouthwatering virtual food to throw at an infinite number virtual children! A collection of ridiculous weapons to hurl food, the likes you’ve never seen and many more surprises!
